alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 11:25AM CST until February 11 at 6:42AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas...Oklahoma... Little River Near Idabel affecting McCurtain, Sevier and Little River Counties. For the Little River...including Idabel, Horatio...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River Near Idabel. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Several hundred acres of lowland will flood at the confluence of the Glover and Little Rivers. Farmers and ranchers should move cattle and farm machinery to higher ground until the high water ends. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 31.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.9 feet on 12/04/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1130 AM CST.
